imdb.plot outline: The Orvis Guide to Fly Fishing is a 13 part documentary television series that teaches the fundamentals of fly fishing for all species, in all waters. Its purpose is simple: to demystify fly fishing, make it fun and clearly demonstrate it is both accessible and affordable to anglers. The Orvis Guide to Fly Fishing will be the new source for helping educate potential fly fishers around the world.
imdb.title: The Orvis Guide to Fly Fishing
akas: The Orvis Guide to Fly Fishing (Canada)
plot: _The Orvis Guide to Fly Fishing_ (qv) is a 13 part documentary television series that teaches the fundamentals of fly fishing for all species, in all waters. Its purpose is simple: to demystify fly fishing, make it fun and clearly demonstrate it is both accessible and affordable to anglers. _The Orvis Guide to Fly Fishing_ (qv) will be the new source for helping educate potential fly fishers around the world.::Colin McKeown
